extendedInfo.description: Think youâre a true car expert? Get this app and see how well you know brands and models! Have fun guessing the car company based on its logo design with âCar Quizâ Game! Watch photos of all kinds of old timers, sports and passenger cars, and guess the make and model!-	4 Different Game Modes-10 Questions, 25 Questions, 50 Questions and Endless!-	Choose the correct answer among A, B, C or D!-	Answer the questions quickly and avoid giving incorrect answers to get higher rankings!-	Answer the question worth more than 2000 points and get Scandalous Score Booster!-	Endless Modeâ5 Errors â Out! â Your game lasts until you choose 5 incorrect answers!-	Log in with Facebook to share your score and achievements!If you are thinking about getting involved in the world of âoldâ cars, you should learn the various classifications. By means of this quiz you can get familiar with lots of makes and models of old vehicles.Did you know that an antique car is in most cases over 45 years old? And it should be maintained in a way that keeps it true to the original manufacturer specifications so that it can be considered antique. The definition of classic car actually says that it must be at least 20 years old, but not more than 40 years old to be considered a classic. It should again have been repaired and maintained in a way that keeps it true to its original design and specifications. In other words it should not be modified or altered. But can you recognize all the classic models? There is also overlap between vintage cars and antique ones. Not all vintage are antique and vice versa. With this app you can watch pictures of many old automobiles and learn how to recognize each one of them. This application will also help you learn more about other types of automobiles. For example, sports cars. We all know that they are engineered to go around corners and straight lines as fast as possible. We also know that they are usually expensive to maintain and not very comfortable (but who cares as they look like supermodels at the beach). But can you recognize each model of these beauties? Get this app, and find out!If youâre concerned about the environment, then you should be able to distinguish between all the types of eco-friendly automobiles, such as smart and hybrids. Electric cars are becoming more and more famous among celebrities, and with this quiz game you can learn about new ones that are just becoming popular. We made this free app so you can have fun and learn more about cars! Hope youâll enjoy discovering all of these fun features and much more!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Well matched questions and picks to challenge the younger crowd... Very happy to see it doesnt only focus on the new performance cars thank you
reviews.author: Jp Myburgh

reviews.title: Good fun!
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars but I do not like notifications of offers in my notification bar. Even when I do not play the game they are send to me :-!

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Crap and boring Spams your phone with advertisement and if you keep clearing it as i do it randomly opens itself and freezes your phone. Game is boring anyway

reviews.title: Car Quiz
reviews.comment: Excellent game, I am a car show fan so I hope that this will become a 2 way learning experience and that I will become better at recognising the less obvious cars by the styles and badges. I haven\'t been beaten yet but I would say I am average... Makes me feel good though :)
reviews.author: Joanne Dodd

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app is so good, I don\'t need friends or company, all I need is this app. Forever
reviews.author: Chengyan Jiang

reviews.title: pop up very anoying
reviews.comment: very good quiz, well put, fun to play, test your knowledge to some level. Unfortunately their is to many pop-up of ads that constantly appeared on the promp bar at anytime of the day even when you\'re not playing. I found it so anoying that it made me want to delete the application. It could easely have been a 4 stars if that problem was fixed and a 5 if it would give the option to choose what continent you wich to play in as you don\'t find the same brand and models in north america and europe for example.
reviews.author: Vincent Labelle

reviews.title: Addictive but annoying
reviews.comment: Excellent game to learn & test you knowledge but annoying popups hit you after almost every game.

reviews.title: Not for most
reviews.comment: First of all, the ads are a little intrusive. Second, the difficulty is pretty much non existent. I was expecting something more on the technical side. Engine size, model year, horse power, etc. Not logos and pictures of cars. Still, nice interface though.
